name: BI Unfuck Systemss
desc: Core engine-level fixes and overrides for BI AI behaviour, configs, and scheduling. Everything else depends on this.
video: video/Arma Reforger DCO AI - Failing hard against our AI.mp4

name: Vision Limiting
desc: AI will have a slower detection time at night and will aim less accurate in night time.

name: Individual morale
desc: The individual AI's emotional reaction to pressure such as passing bullets, near misses, near, explosions, wounds etc. Low morale will increase the chance for a soldier Systems to take cover, go prone or hide from enemy fire and do so for a longer time. Soldier Systemss with high morale will be more aggressive, will push forward and will return fire with less chance of heading for cover.

name: Danger reaction
desc: The AI's instinctual reaction to danger events such as incoming fire, explosions, wounds etc. AI reactions will range from flinching, dodging for cover, evading, going prone in the open.

name: Improved Long range engagements
desc: Tweaks to make AI engage at longer distances. This includes info sharing and use of radios and vocal warnings between soldier Systemss.

name: Suppression
desc: AI's ability to suppress detected or identified enemies.

name: Adjust to cover
desc: AI's ability to use advanced stance adjustment to adapt to cover geometry.

name: Emergency rearm
desc: Soldier Systemss will pick up ammo for his rifle if available. If not, he will pick up nearby weapons that has available ammo for it.

name: Close combat behaviour
desc: Soldier Systemss will prioritize using buildings as cover (not possible yet as it can not ID a building yet), if in melee range, soldier Systemss will engage in melee with the enemy. If within 50 meters from detected enemies, the soldier Systems will avoid going prone and find cover instead.

name: IDLE behaviour
desc: A soldier Systems that has not received a movement order in 60 seconds, will seek to spread out and take cover. If static guns are avail, AI will man them automatically. Buildings and hard structures will be prioritized as cover once BI enables ID type of cover.. There is a chance the soldier Systems will patrol the nearby area.  Will patrol within a 150 m radius around the SL

name: Tactics
desc: If no custom settings are forced, the Group leader will initiate Five types of tactics
